patthana15.63:1.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.63:2.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Abyākatamūlaṃ dve paccayavasena.)
